getTagletOutput

public final com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.TagletOutput getTagletOutput(com.sun.javadoc.Tag tag,
                                                                                         com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.TagletWriter writer)
                                                                                  throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns the taglet output for the specified tag.

Note:

Block taglets do not support output of inline tags, this method will always throw an IllegalArgumentException.

Specified by:
getTagletOutput in interface com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.Taglet
Specified by:
getTagletOutput in class AbstractTagletConverter
Parameters:
tag - the Tag representation of this custom tag.
writer - the TagletWriter.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - , always..
Since:
1.4.0
